nodes.text: Phattro was a beverage served at cantinas and diners in the galaxy. It was suitable for consumption by humans, Bith, and Artiodacs. The purple-hued alcoholic version was sold in bottles with "Moshi" printed in Aurebesh on the label, and could be found at establishments including Moshi Bar and Trueping's on Coruscant and Plop Dribble's at the Stobar spaceport. The drink was advertised on posters in the Coruscant Underworld.

A red, non-alcoholic version was sold at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and at Tuggs' Grub in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. It was considered cool and refreshing, and it was one of chef Strono Tuggs' favorite imported beverages.

A real-world version of this drink is found in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Disneyland's Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Gold Peak unsweetened tea, Odwalla lemonade, desert pear."
